title: I was just told Darius was op, I was vs a Gnar in ranked.
body: How is Darius op vs Gnar?

replies.body: if him and a mega gnar walk into a fight on an equal footing can Darius brawl with him because he's one of the only champs that might be able to
but obviously mini gnar is nearly impossible for darius to deal with
Not even. Apprehend outranges gnar's AA, so if darius can dodge boomerangs, it should be pretty well in darius's favor.
And he loses the trade and dies next time?
No. And then Gnar wins the trade because he can then AA and Q at Darius since Darius's E is on a much longer CD and Gnar's E. Gnar can kite any melee without a gap close for days.

Gnar's attack range early on is inside of your yank range, too.

The Gnar was basically butthurt that he couldn't autopilot the lane

He's not Gnar and Garen are some of the few people who counter Darius.

Before the mobility creep took over was when Darius was at his height
if only apprehend checked for units as it pulled in instead of on the way out, you know, so you can actually react to it.
who told you darius is op...
The Gnar, I killed him at level 3 and snowballed afterwards as he would jump on me when he was mega, got a double kill vs him and the jungler but with only 15 hp left, he called Darius op.
